titleStmt.title: The practyse of prelates. Compyled by the faythfull and godly learned man, Wyllyam Tyndale
titleStmt.author: Tyndale, William, d. 1536.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Anthony Scoloker and Willyam Seres. Dwellynge wythout Temple barre in the Sauoy rentes,

notesStmt.note: At foot of title page: Cum priuilegio ad imprimendum solum.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

person.persName: Willyam Seres. Dwellynge wythout Temple barre
